form.name: negative_malaria_test
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Fever> Negative Malaria Test

field.name: Does the child have any of the following conditions?
Fever with Negative Malaria Test
field.options: Cause of fever either known or unknown OR | Runny nose present OR | Negative malaria test | Click here to take action

field.name: Severe complicated measles
field.options: If malaria test negative PLUS | Any general danger sign OR | Clouding of cornea OR | Deep or extensive mouth ulcers | Click here to take action

field.name: Measles with eye or mouth complications
field.options: If malaria test negative PLUS | Pus draining from eye OR | Mouth ulcers | Click here to take action

field.name: Uncomplicated measles
field.options: If malaria test negative PLUS | Measles now OR | Measles within last 3 months | Click here to take action
